15k+ Reviews  5/5 “My favourite portable charger. Holds several charges. Durable, highly useful. This thing is amazing.”

High Compatibility

It supports many types of devices, such as iPhone, Samsung, iPad and Switch, which is so convenient for charging different devices.

Multi-Protection Technology

It is adopted several protective mechanisms, such as overcharge, over-current, overheat protection and short-circuit protection.

Minimalist Design

Their lightweight, slim design fits easily in your bag so you’ve always got portable power.

Durability

The powerstation portable power banks are designed to survive the hazards of travel and the contents of your bag.

Reliable Battery

Reliable battery cells hold their charge for when you need it most.

Superior Safety

Our safety system combines high-voltage protection, current regulation, temperature control, and more to keep you and your devices safe.
